====== Minimal Template ======


===== About =====
A ''minimal'' template is the simplest layout of them all, as its prints only the content. 



{{:docs:theme:template:blank_layout.svg?0x250|}}

===== Layout Elements =====

The ''minimal'' template supports:
  * the [[:docs:theme:element:main-header|main header]]
  * the [[:docs:theme:element:toc|toc]]

All other [[docs:theme:element:element|elements]] are not supported.

The [[:docs:theme:element:main|page content]] is [[:docs:theme:element:container|contained]].


===== Usage =====

This layout is mainly used:
  * to export/print the content.
  * to integrate the page into another website.


===== Example =====


[[?template=minimal|Click on this link to see the minimal template in action]]
